title: Crypto solutions offer hope for financial inclusion in developing countries
description: Financial inclusion has long been a challenge in developing countries, with many individuals opting for cash transactions due to deep-rooted distrust of traditional banking systems. title: Seneca Protocol hacker returns $5.3m from the $6.4m breach

title: Investors turn to Immutable, Mantle, and Pullix in late February

title: Spot Bitcoin ETF trading volume approaches $6b
description: On Feb. 28, 2024, trading volume for nine spot Bitcoin (BTC) ETFs approached $6 billion. The figure is more than double the previous high set on Feb. 26, when the trading volume was $2.4 billion, Bloomberg Intelligence analyst Eric Balchunas…

title: BinaryX IGO to list Project Matthew: Build A Space City With ERC-404 NFTs
description: Singapore, Singapore, February 29th, 2024, Chainwire BinaryX announced today the highly anticipated launch of their first Initial Game Offering (IGO) of the year, Project Matthew. Project Matthew is a space-building simulation game where players get to experience what it is like to work in space, officially known as the planet Matthew in the game. In [...]

title: Banking Giant HSBC Ventures into Tokenization: Ripple’s Metaco Alliance Sparks Excitement Among XRP Supporters
description: HSBC Hong Kong boosts wealth management with diverse investment options, eyeing growth in U.S. stocks and fixed-income funds amid market optimism. Collaboration with Ripple-acquired Metaco signals HSBC’s entry into the crypto space, exploring tokenization tech for broader asset investment.
